workflowTemplates.title: Workflow Templates
workflowTemplates.description: Design and manage reusable workflow blueprints

workflow.description: Design and execute your AI workflows

agents.description: Configure and manage your AI agents

tasks.description: Define and organize your workflow tasks

llmConnections.description: Manage and configure your connections to various Large Language Models

gemini.title: Google Gemini Configuration
gemini.description: Enter your Google AI Studio API key to connect to Gemini models

deepseek.description: Provide your API key to connect to Deepseek models

ollama.title: Ollama Configuration
ollama.description: Configure your connection to local Ollama instance

anthropic.title: Anthropic Configuration
anthropic.description: Enter your Anthropic API key to connect to Claude models

crews.title: My Crews
crews.description: Create, configure and run your AI execution teams
crews.noCrewsDescription: Create your first execution crew based on a workflow template
crews.noCrewsFoundDescription: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
crews.searchPlaceholder: Search crews by name, description, or template...

wizard.title: Create New Crew
wizard.description: Follow these steps to create and configure your AI execution crew
wizard.selectTemplateDescription: Choose a workflow template as the foundation for your crew
wizard.configureAgentsDescription: Set up LLM models and tools for each agent in your crew
wizard.crewDetailsDescription: Provide a name and description for your new crew
wizard.crewNamePlaceholder: Enter a descriptive name for your crew
wizard.crewDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this crew is designed to accomplish

errors.agentsRequired: Please configure at least one agent
errors.nameTooLong: Crew name must be less than 100 characters

agent.maxTokensTooltip: Maximum number of tokens the model can generate
agent.temperatureTooltip: Controls randomness in the model's responses (0.0 = deterministic, 2.0 = very creative)
agent.apiKeyNoticeDescription: API keys are encrypted and stored securely. They are only used for tool execution.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: Configure input variables for this execution
variables.noVariables: This workflow doesn't require any input variables

topic.description: The main topic or subject for content creation

targetAudience.description: The intended audience for the content

wordCount.description: Target word count for the content

includeImages.description: Whether to include images in the content

settings.title: Execution Settings
settings.description: Configure how this execution should be handled

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: Set the execution priority in the queue

preview.title: Preview
preview.description: Review your execution configuration before starting
preview.warning: Once started, this execution cannot be easily stopped. Make sure all settings are correct.

errors.invalidTimeout: Timeout must be between 1 minute and 24 hours
